author: mommsen
body:
This pull request provides a proper unpacker for the TCDS payload and persists the relevant quantities from the TCDS FED in the TCDSRecord. This code resides in a new package DataFormats/TCDS. It replaces the FED1024 class which exposes direct access to the underlying data structure, and incorporates the separate BSTRecord. I also changed the code using the old accessors to the new ones, as far as I could find them. In addition, the EventAuxiliary is now filled with the current fill (store) number instead of 'edm::EventAuxiliary::invalidStoreNumber'.

This PR replaces #20387.
title: Persist TCDS FED payload
